@RUchipped @hornets @MELOD1P Well, the Order of the Eastern Star is headquartered at a building within DC.

The Scottish Rite, SJ-USA was initially headquartered in SC, but later moved to DC. The Scottish Rite NMJ is headquartered in Boston.
